nodes.text: The Sil'Lume asteroid belt was an asteroid belt located in the Seitia sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Over 800,000 of the asteroids were cataloged and claimed for mining or other operations, including 24 Tredway, 40,005 Milton, and 400,324 Henryson.
During the Yavin blockade, Luke Skywalker went to the Sil'Lume asteroid belt to scout its potential as a new Rebel base.
